name: Swell Swigs
description:
A place where you will definitely find your filling of sweet treats. 

Come along as you embark on discovering every combination you can make on this swig of a journey you’ll have to try to see if you can unlock them all, who knows what awaits you at the end! 

Combine your ingredients through the mixer slots on the top left hand side of the screen, but be careful of the ingredients you combine or you might end up with some goop! 

Scroll through the different combination you have made with the pink bar on the right hand side along with the rest of the ingredients.

We hope you have a swell time here!
